scripts.start: webpack serve --mode development & npm run open
scripts.deploy: git checkout launch && npm run stop && npm run build && mkdir ~/tempFloitFolder && cp -r dist ~/tempFloitFolder && git checkout main && cp ~/tempFloitFolder/dist/index.html index.html && cp ~/tempFloitFolder/dist/main.js main.js && cp -r ~/tempFloitFolder/dist/images . && rm -rf ~/tempFloitFolder && git add . && git commit -m "new build on main"
